00016 // INCLUDE FILES
00017 #include <hal.h>
00018 #include <eikenv.h>
00019 #include <AknUtils.h>
00020 
00021 #include "FocusEventAppView.h"
00022 #include "EikonEnvironment.h"
00023 
00024 // ============================ MEMBER FUNCTIONS ===============================
00025 
00026 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00027 // CFocusEventAppView::CFocusEventAppView()
00028 // C++ default constructor can NOT contain any code, that might leave.
00029 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00030 //
00031 CFocusEventAppView::CFocusEventAppView()
00032     {
00033     // No implementation required
00034     }
00035 
00036 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00037 // CFocusEventAppView::NewL()
00038 // Two-phased constructor.
00039 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040 //
00041 CFocusEventAppView* CFocusEventAppView::NewL( const TRect& aRect )
00042     {
00043     CFocusEventAppView* self = NewLC( aRect );
00044     CleanupStack::Pop( self );
00045     return self;
00046     }
00047 
00048 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 // CFocusEventAppView::NewLC()
00050 // Two-phased constructor.
00051 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00052 //
00053 CFocusEventAppView* CFocusEventAppView::NewLC( const TRect& aRect )
00054     {
00055     CFocusEventAppView* self = new ( ELeave ) CFocusEventAppView;
00056     CleanupStack::PushL( self );
00057     self->ConstructL( aRect );
00058     return self;
00059     }
00060 
00061 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00062 // CFocusEventAppView::ConstructL()
00063 // Symbian 2nd phase constructor can leave.
00064 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00065 //
00066 void CFocusEventAppView::ConstructL( const TRect& aRect )
00067     {
00068     // Create a window for this application view
00069     CreateWindowL();
00070 
00071     // Set the windows size
00072     SetRect( aRect );
00073 
00074     // Activate the window, which makes it ready to be drawn
00075     ActivateL();
00076 
00077     // Add the first blank line to the array of text lines
00078     User::LeaveIfError( iTextLines.Append( KNullDesC() ) );
00079     }
00080 
00081 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00082 // CFocusEventAppView::~CFocusEventAppView()
00083 // Destructor.
00084 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00085 //
00086 CFocusEventAppView::~CFocusEventAppView()
00087     {
00088     iTextLines.Close();
00089     }
00090 
00091 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00092 // CFocusEventAppView::Draw()
00093 // Draws the display.
00094 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00095 //
00096 void CFocusEventAppView::Draw( const TRect& /*aRect*/ ) const
00097     {
00098 
00099     // Get the standard graphics context
00100     CWindowGc& gc = SystemGc();
00101 
00102     // Gets the control's extent
00103     TRect drawRect=Rect();
00104     gc.UseFont( NEikonEnvironment::EikEnv().AnnotationFont() );
00105 
00106     // Clears the screen
00107     gc.Clear( drawRect );
00108 
00109     // Draw all lines of text
00110     TInt count;
00111     for ( count = 0; count < iTextLines.Count(); count++ )
00112         {
00113         gc.DrawText( iTextLines[ count ],
00114         TPoint( KTextXMargin, KTextMinY+
00115                                      ( count*KTextDistanceBetweenLines ) ) );
00116         }
00117     }
00118 
00119 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00120 // CFocusEventAppView::Print()
00121 // Show text on screen.
00122 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00123 //
00124 void CFocusEventAppView::Print( const TDesC& aText )
00125     {
00126     ShowTextOnScreen( aText );
00127     }
00128 
00129 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00130 // CFocusEventAppView::ShowTextOnScreen()
00131 // Show text on screen.
00132 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00133 //
00134 void CFocusEventAppView::ShowTextOnScreen( const TDesC& aText )
00135     {
00136     // Add the text line onto the last line
00137     TInt lastTextLine = iTextLines.Count() - 1;
00138 
00139     // Make sure the text line doesn't get too long for the buffer.
00140     // This should really clip rather than not do anything
00141     // if the line is too long.
00142     if ( aText.Length() + iTextLines[ lastTextLine ].Length()
00143                                   <= KTestFrameworkMaxScreenMessageLength )
00144         {
00145         iTextLines[ lastTextLine ].Append( aText );
00146         DrawNow();
00147         }
00148     }
00149 
00150 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00151 // CFocusEventAppView::PrintNewLineL()
00152 // Print new line.
00153 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00154 //
00155 void CFocusEventAppView::PrintNewLineL()
00156     {
00157     // Add a new line onto the array
00158     // If the array is already at the maximum size,
00159     // delete the first line of text
00160     if ( iTextLines.Count() >= KMaxTextLines )
00161         {
00162         iTextLines.Remove( 0 );
00163         }
00164     User::LeaveIfError( iTextLines.Append( KNullDesC() ) );
00165     DrawNow();
00166     }
00167 
00168 // ---------------------------------------------------------
00169 // CFocusEventAppView::HandleResourceChange()
00170 // Called by framework when layout is changed.
00171 // ---------------------------------------------------------
00172 //
00173 void CFocusEventAppView::HandleResourceChange(TInt aType)
00174     {
00175     CCoeControl::HandleResourceChange(aType);
00176 
00177     // ADDED FOR SCALABLE UI SUPPORT
00178     // *****************************
00179     if ( aType==KEikDynamicLayoutVariantSwitch )
00180         {
00181         TRect rect;
00182         AknLayoutUtils::LayoutMetricsRect(AknLayoutUtils::EMainPane, rect);
00183         SetRect(rect);
00184         }
00185     }
